changes.rscadd: Inquisitors can purchase crossbows and lifeblood. Inquisitor favour list slightly tweaked (for example, chain gloves now come in one pair and not two)
Craftable wooden and metal psydon cross

changes.balance: 3 Adepts can now spawn roundstart, there can be a total of 2 adepts of the same advclass.
Slight changes to brutal zealot and inquisitor skills/stats/traits

changes.map: Major changes to the Old Church.
